title: Edgewalker - a conversation with Linda Schele (2010)
description:
Before she died, the renowned Mayanist epigrapher, Linda Schele, gave an interview on her life, Mayan sites such as Palenque and Tikal, and translation of Maya glyphs.

This is a copy of the hard to find (and out of print) indie documentary "Edgewalker", which features a 48 minute interview with Linda Schele, as well as a presentation and Q&A session she gave at NASA, speaking about Mayan cosmology.

An interesting look at one of the most prolific figures in Mayan studies, highly recommended for armchair Mayanists, and anyone fascinated by ancient history and culture.

Directors: Andrew Weeks, Simon Martin, Lori Conley
Format: 4:3 NTSC AVI
Studio: Andrew Weeks and David Schele
DVD Release Date: March 22, 2010
Run Time: 48 minutes
Size: 795 MB
